EmailTemplate.subject: Mental health issues are on the rise. What are they costing you?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Identifying—and addressing—mental health needs pays off Whether it’s a case of the blues or a more serious clinical diagnosis, mental health challenges cost us all time, attention and resources. Of course, virtual solutions help address these needs—and an integrated approach for both mind and body can help identify mental health needs earlier, connecting your members with the right level of support even faster.
Most people are not getting the care they need. Twenty-seven million adults experiencing a mental health illness are going untreated.2 Our at-a-glance infographic outlines five helpful tips to accelerate mental healthcare access, affordability and equity—and how that translates into better outcomes. _______________________[1] Blue Cross Blue Shield Health Index.
